Simple Modals

Modals are based off of the Bootstrap Modal component. They are full-width at small screen layouts, with various width constraining options at larger screen layouts, applied with modifier classes.

This is clearly some text.

This is clearly some text.

This is clearly some text.

Bootstrap docs 
<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-basic">
  Default
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-basic">
  <div class="modal-dialog">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-small">
  Small
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-small">
  <div class="modal-dialog modal-sm">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-large">
  Large
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-large">
  <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Color Variations

Background and border colors can be altered by applying additional classes to the .modal-content element.

This is clearly some text.

This is clearly some text.

Bootstrap docs 
<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-teal">
  Teal Theme
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-teal">
  <div class="modal-dialog">
    <div class="modal-content modal-teal">
      <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-tan">
  Tan Theme
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-tan">
  <div class="modal-dialog">
    <div class="modal-content modal-tan">
      <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Complex Modals

Additional elements, .modal-header and .modal-footer, can be used to section off the top or bottom of the modal content.

Header

This is clearly some text.

Header

This is clearly some text.

Bootstrap docs 
<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-header">
  Header
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-header">
  <div class="modal-dialog">
    <div class="modal-content modal-teal">
      <div class="modal-header clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <h1 class="modal-title">Header</h1>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<button class="btn btn-lg btn-default"
 data-toggle="modal"
 data-target="#modal-example-header-footer">
  Header + Footer
</button>

<div class="modal" id="modal-example-header-footer">
  <div class="modal-dialog">
    <div class="modal-content modal-tan">
      <div class="modal-header clearfix">
        <button class="btn btn-blank close pull-right"
         data-dismiss="modal"
         aria-hidden="true"
         type="button">
          <svg class="icon">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/images/symbol/svg/sprite.symbol.svg#close"></use>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <h1 class="modal-title">Header</h1>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
        <p>This is clearly some text.</p>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-footer">
        <button class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
          Close
        </button>
        <button class="btn btn-primary" type="button">
          Save changes
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
